text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/efa1923565f0669d5bc09714b22a3b50cde03785|patch 8.2.2471: popup_setoptions() does not set textprop in other tab>
patch 8.2.2471: popup_setoptions() does not set textprop in other tab

Problem:    Popup_setoptions() does not set textprop in other tab.
Solution:   use win_valid_any_tab(). (closes #7788)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2471: popup_setoptions() does not set textprop in other tab · vim/vim@efa1923
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2471: popup_setoptions() does not set textprop in other tab · vim/vim@efa1923
attachments.text: Problem: Popup_setoptions() does not set textprop in other tab. Solution: use win_valid_any_tab(). (closes #7788)

patch 8.2.2470: popup_getoptions() does not get textprop from other tab

Problem:    Popup_getoptions() does not get textprop from other tab.
Solution:   use win_valid_any_tab(). (closes #7786)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f5a5116a96b1877c3f44e7bae288fd6603151eb1|patch 8.2.2469: confusing error if :winsize has a wrong argument>
patch 8.2.2469: confusing error if :winsize has a wrong argument

Problem:    Confusing error if :winsize has a wrong argument.
Solution:   Quote the argument in the error. (closes #2523)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2469: confusing error if :winsize has a wrong argument · vim/vim@f5a5116
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2469: confusing error if :winsize has a wrong argument · vim/vim@f5a5116
attachments.text: Problem: Confusing error if :winsize has a wrong argument. Solution: Quote the argument in the error. (closes #2523)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/038e09ee7645731de0296d255aabb17603276443|patch 8.2.2468: not easy to get the full command name from a shortene…>
patch 8.2.2468: not easy to get the full command name from a shortened one

Problem:    Not easy to get the full command name from a shortened one.
Solution:   Add fullcommand(). (Martin Tournoij, closes #7777)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2468: not easy to get the full command name from a shortene… · vim/vim@038e09e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2468: not easy to get the full command name from a shortene… · vim/vim@038e09e
attachments.text: …d one Problem: Not easy to get the full command name from a shortened one. Solution: Add fullcommand(). (Martin Tournoij, closes #7777)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/139348f3e8370826a1ceb10c73f7c7bb586f8125|patch 8.2.2467: script generated by :mkview changes alternate file>
patch 8.2.2467: script generated by :mkview changes alternate file

Problem:    Script generated by :mkview changes alternate file.
Solution:   Only write :balt in the session file. (Harish Rajagopal,
            closes #7779)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2467: script generated by :mkview changes alternate file · vim/vim@139348f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2467: script generated by :mkview changes alternate file · vim/vim@139348f
attachments.text: Problem: Script generated by :mkview changes alternate file. Solution: Only write :balt in the session file. (Harish Rajagopal, closes #7779)
